net.sf.jasperreports.export

Interface JxlReportConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonExportConfiguration, ReportExportConfiguration, XlsReportConfiguration
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JxlMetadataReportConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleJxlMetadataReportConfiguration, SimpleJxlReportConfiguration
    Deprecated. 
    To be removed.

    public interface JxlReportConfiguration
extends XlsReportConfiguration
    Interface containing settings used by the JExcelApi exporters.
    Author:
    Teodor Danciu (teodord@users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    JExcelApiExporter, JExcelApiMetadataExporter

      • PROPERTY_COMPLEX_FORMAT

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_COMPLEX_FORMAT

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • isComplexFormat

        java.lang.Boolean isComplexFormat()
        Deprecated. 
        Flag specifying whether the cell format pattern is user-defined. When set to true, the exporter will assume that the specified pattern is well defined. If the pattern is invalid, it won't be taken into account by the Excel file viewer.
        See Also:
        PROPERTY_COMPLEX_FORMAT
